item.title: Bangalore to Alleppey Solo Trip: Backwaters & Travel Guide
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Alleppey is one of the most refreshing experiences you can plan for yourself. With its calm backwaters, coconut-lined canals, houseboats, and slow-paced village life, Alleppey offers the kind of peace that feels far removed from city chaos.
